name: A Really Bad Case of the Mondays
name_original: A Really Bad Case of the Mondays
description:
(Play in Fullscreen)

It is Monday. T. Hardy came back from his Sunday bar crawl, passed out, and has just woke up late for work. His only hope to keep his job is to sneak in, sit in his home cubicle, and pretend like nothing’s wrong.

In A Really Bad Case of the Mondays, you must make your way to work without being noticed by your coworkers or security. Use the mouse to drag T. Hardy around the screen dodging cars, coworkers, and security.

Made for LD41 Gamejam
